summary: Astana, previously called Nur-Sultan and other names, is Kazakhstan's capital city. Located in the north-central part of the country, it's the second-largest city after Almaty. With a population of over 1.3 million, Astana became the capital in 1997 and has since grown into a modern city with unique, futuristic architecture designed by Kisho Kurokawa. It's home to important government buildings and is a priority destination for tourist development.
title: Astana
